category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECTRevisionChangeAddAdditional
preference.preference_description: Controls whether additional objects are output by the "MESINTEG_ValidateReleaseAndExport" and "ME-create-revision-change-xml-AH" workflow handlers delta XML for removed and replaced change elements, as controlled by the closure rule specified by the "MECTRevisionChangeClosureRule" preference. Valid values are true or false.
